author: Lisa Ball
description: Serve with breakfast cereal and you'll be set up for the day. The high fresh banana content means this drink will quickly turn brown if left. This can be countered by adding fresh lemon juice and balancing with more honey but this detracts from the fresh banana flavour.
name: Banana so Smoothie (Alcohol-free*)
recipeIngredient: 90 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy

recipeInstructions.text: BLEND ingredients with 6oz scoop of crushed ice
Pour into glass and serve immediately with straws
